short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to improve web accessibility

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that enables website users to adjust font sizes, line-heights, and letter spacing for readability, It allows for personal customizations to meet specific user needs.

Unlike existing solutions that focus on a single function or static compliance, our tool is an all-in-one solution offering adaptive content digestibility.
